variations.template: Any amount of damage <target_deals> to a creature is enough to destroy it.
rts: Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.
Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it.
Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.
Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.

variations.template: Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.
rts: Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.

variations.template: Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it. {C} represents colorless mana.
rts: Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it. {C} represents colorless mana.
